definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: The types that cause disease are rare, Sadowski says.
sentences.chinese: 薩道斯基說，大腸桿菌會致病的種類很少。

sentences.english: Now people have known more 25 kinds of Colicins.
sentences.chinese: 現已發現的大腸菌素達25種之多。

sentences.english: Will make every effort to achieve will drop an intestinal juices introduction large intestine deeper spot.
sentences.chinese: 力求做到將滴腸液引入大腸更深的部位。

sentences.english: The antibacterial ability of chitosan to E. coli was related to the protonation of amino group.
sentences.chinese: 殼聚糖對大腸桿菌的抑菌作用與其氨基的質子化有關。

sentences.english: Furthermore, significance of colonoscopy in the early postoperative period should be emphasized.
sentences.chinese: 此外，大腸鏡檢查在術後早期的診斷有其重要性存在。

sentences.english: Objective: To study the clinical features of metachronous colorectal carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 多發大腸癌的臨牀特點。

sentences.english: German health authorities have not confirmed the source of E. coli.
sentences.chinese: 德國衛生當局目前還未確認大腸桿菌源頭。

sentences.english: These infections are often caused by Escherichia coli and Proteus mirabilis.
sentences.chinese: 這些感染經常有大腸桿菌和奇異變形桿菌引起。

sentences.english: Consider colonies producing gas in the Durham tubes as coliforms.
sentences.chinese: 導管內產氣的菌落爲大腸菌羣陽性。

sentences.english: Exercise may reduce the risk of heart disease and breast and colon cancers.
sentences.chinese: 運動可能減少心臟病和大腸癌的風險。

sentences.english: Large intestines popping out of the umbilicus in Chihuahuas are uncommon.
sentences.chinese: 大腸濟華花的臍出去一下是不尋常的。

sentences.english: Colorectal cancer accounts for nine per cent of new cancer cases every year worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 大腸癌佔每年世界各地新癌症病例的9%。

sentences.english: However, contamination of coliform group might occur during beer brewing.
sentences.chinese: 生產過程中可能會污染大腸菌羣。

sentences.english: Avian Escherichia coli pili antigen was detected with agar gel diffusion precipitin test.
sentences.chinese: 用瓊脂擴散沉澱反應檢測了大腸桿菌菌毛抗原。

sentences.english: Objective Evaluation of the surgical treatment of multiple original carcinomas in aged patients of colon cancer.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結手術治療老年大腸癌病人多原發癌的經驗。

sentences.english: Prevention steps also include vaccinating for coliform mastitis.
sentences.chinese: 預防措施還包括接種大腸菌乳腺炎疫苗。

definition: qi and blood (two basic bodily fluids of Chinese medicine)
rarity/rare delicacy/foreign matter/alien body/the dead/ghost/monstrosity/alien life-form
